title.rendered: 2023 Women’s World Cup Follow USA Travel Packages

content.rendered:
Follow Team USA at the 2023 Women’s World Cup

It is one thing to experience the excitement of the Women’s World Cup in person, but to be there to cheer on your own team and display your national pride is a thrill like no other. Our Follow Team USA travel packages allow you to follow Team USA as they journey around Australia and New Zealand in pursuit of the Women’s World Cup Championship. Whether you want to celebrate with other USA fans in a group atmosphere or enjoy a more private experience, we can arrange the perfect itinerary for you.

Our Follow Team USA travel packages include your preferred category of accommodations in each host city, inter-city transportation, match day experiences including private or group transfers, daily breakfast, professional on-site hosts, and much more. In addition, all of our Women’s World Cup packages can be customized to create your perfect experience with extras like additional nights, private tours, and memorable dining experiences. We’ll be there for you every step of the way so you can relax and enjoy all the excitement that surrounds this incredible event.

Join us in Australia and New Zealand as the USWNT takes on the world at one of soccer’s biggest events! Complete 2023 Women’s World Cup Follow Team USA packages are now available from $3,945 per person (7-night packages) and from $6,335 per person (12-night packages), based on double occupancy.
